Class ShareButton

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class ShareButton
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget

A Facebook "share" link or button. See http://wiki.developers.facebook.com/index.php/Fb:share-button.

Author:
David Wolverton

public void setURL(java.lang.String url)
The URL to share. Default is the page that contains the button.

The title for the shared URL. Default is the HTML page title.

Overrides:
setTitle in class com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject

getStyle

public ShareButton.Style getStyle()

setStyle

public void setStyle(ShareButton.Style style)
How to render the button: A Facebook ICON_ONLY, LINK_ONLY without any icon, LINK_AND_ICON with a Facebook icon and link text or BUTTON with a Facebook icon that says "Share". (The default is BUTTON.)

See http://www.facebook .com/share_partners.php

Parameters:
style -

getText

public java.lang.String getText()

setText

public void setText(java.lang.String text)
The text to display in the link or button. If none is specified, links will use "Share on Facebook" and buttons will use "Share".
